content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:fn="http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions" xmlns:xdt="http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-datatypes"> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>Bureau of Ocean Energy Management</origin> <pubdate>20150129</pubdate> <title>2017-2022 Draft Proposed Program - All Areas</title> <pubinfo> <pubplace>Herndon, VA</pubplace> <publish>Bureau of Ocean Energy Management</publish> </pubinfo> <onlink>http://geoplatform.maps.arcgis.com/sharing/rest/content/items/9cfaa91b319a481f837adec078254c50/data?token=BAMZdavIKTAu4upRTGUyoMSoplx5CH5ciufQdBw7ZPE3fdfj-UouItAcMkMqDkEhCdXYy6yryVRlKU7tqfzZfc4wnncyubjZ_K_Upy1a6rfnFB3nNwUqHq79gexEq19qTGWnGd3fU-sVh_C-AUyPjTwfVM87PIeDg9GP0qdoPAsQLxyqtMZ80_eyZA7RZ11L</onlink> <onlink>http://services1.arcgis.com/Hp6G80Pky0om7QvQ/arcgis/rest/services/2017_2022_Draft_Proposed_Program_for_Oil_and_Gas_Leasing_on_the_OCS/FeatureServer/0</onlink> <onlink>http://www.boem.gov/Five-Year-Program/</onlink> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract>This file represents the program areas of the Outer Continental Shelf that have been included in the 2017-2022 Outer Continental Shelf Oil and Gas Leasing Draft Proposed Program.</abstract> <purpose>This file represents the program areas of the Outer Continental Shelf that have been included in the 2017-2022 Outer Continental Shelf Oil and Gas Leasing Draft Proposed Program.  On January 27, 2015, Secretary Jewell announced the Draft Proposed Program (DPP) for a 2017-2022 Program. The DPP includes eight planning areas\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdthree in the Gulf of Mexico, two in the Atlantic, and three in Alaska\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdand nearly 80% of estimated undiscovered technically available oil and gas resources on the U.S. Outer Continental Shelf. The DPP schedules 14 potential lease sales in those areas for the 2017\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd2022 period in eight program areas \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 10 sales in the Gulf of Mexico, one in the Atlantic (which would cover portions of two planning areas) and three off the coast of Alaska.</purpose> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>20150130</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>Publication date</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>Complete</progress> <update>As needed</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-168.976949</westbc> <eastbc>-70.043161</eastbc> <northbc>74.996354</northbc> <southbc>25.581983</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Category</themekt> <themekey>boundaries</themekey> <themekey>environment</themekey> <themekey>oceans</themekey> <themekey>planningCadastre</themekey> </theme> </keywords> <accconst>None.</accconst> <useconst>None.
